description: Updated schedule and scores for the college football bowl games leading up to the College Football Playoff games.
title: 2016-17 college football bowl schedule
text:
College football bowl schedule for the 2016-17 season.
The College Football Playoff semifinal games decided the national championship matchup between Alabama and Clemson. The game will be played Monday, Jan. 9, 2017, in Tampa, Fla.
(All game times Eastern.)
SATURDAY, DEC. 17
AFR Celebration Bowl: Grambling State 10, N.C. Central 9 | Photos
[...]
Gildan New Mexico Bowl: New Mexico 23, Texas - San Antonio 20
Las Vegas Bowl: San Diego State 34, Houston 10
AutoNation Cure Bowl: Arkansas State 31, Central Florida 13
Raycom Media Camellia Bowl: Appalachian State 31, Toledo 28
R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl: Southern Miss 28, Louisiana-Lafayette 21
MONDAY, DEC. 19
Miami Beach Bowl: Tulsa 55, Central Michigan 10
TUESDAY, DEC. 20
Boca Raton Bowl: Western Kentucky 51, Memphis 31
WEDNESDAY, DEC. 21
San Diego County CU Poinsettia Bowl: BYU 24, Wyoming 21
THURSDAY, DEC. 22

FRIDAY, DEC. 23
Popeyes Bahamas Bowl: Old Dominion 24, Eastern Michigan 20
Lockheed Martin Armed Forces Bowl: Louisiana Tech 48, Navy 45
Dollar General Bowl: Troy 28, Ohio 23
• Road to College Football Playoff

SATURDAY, DEC. 31
Buffalo Wild Wings Citrus Bowl: LSU 29, Louisville 9

MONDAY, JAN. 2, 2017

MONDAY, JAN. 9, 2017
College Football Playoff National Championship, in Tampa, Fla.
8:30 p.m., ESPN: (1) Alabama vs. (2) Clemson
